thread.title: Rich Reasons
thread.title_full: Starfire Direct reviewed by Rich Reasons

author: Rich Reasons
title: Rich Reasons
text: I have managed hundreds of home improvement projects large and small over the years. Without question, my experience with Starfire Direct ranks among the best I have encountered. Their staff is friendly and committed to serving the customer. They coached me through a fire pit build process flawlessly and gave me the guidance, support and materials to complete the job on a tight budget and timeline. I am really happy with the outcome and I will look to them first when I have another project in the works.
